text: Nagyhuta (Slovak: Veľká Huta) is a village in Sátoraljaújhely District of Borsod-Abaúj-Zemplén County. Its population in 2024 was 78. == Location == It is located in the central part of the Zemplén Mountains, 92 kilometers northeast of the county seat, Miskolc. == History == The settlement was founded in the 18th century. == Population == In 2022, 91.9% of the population identified as Hungarian, 24.3% as Slovak, 2.7% as German, 2.7% as Romanian, 2.7% as Ukrainian, and 13.5% as other non-local nationalities (8.1% did not respond; due to dual identities, the total may exceed 100%). Regarding religion, 51.4% were Roman Catholic, 2.7% Reformed, 2.7% Greek Catholic, 5.4% other Christian (37.8% did not answer).Nagyhuta ==References== Category:Villages in Hungary Category:Settlements in Borsod-Abaúj-Zemplén County
title: Nagyhuta
